shawl 8 **lovely mix of complexity and simplicity ** worked in the round this crochet blanket pattern features a waves motif and is just as lovely to crochet as it is to gift and use it is very impressive and beautiful the combination of used stitches creates pattern that is appropriate for the adventurous beginner to intermediate level crocheters the repetitive pattern is very addictive and will keep you interested and excited the pattern is so adaptable so simply repeat row until you get the desired size of your crochet blanket the pattern uses us crochet terminology and contains full written instruction and chart **materials & tools ** 1 yarn scheepjes whirl 215g = 1000m 60% cotton 40% acrylic 1 cake for the shawl sample i used indigo plane 553 colorway 2 hook size 3 5mm adjust
